mapper.select: SELECT u.*, r.id AS role_id, r.role_name, r.role_code, m.permission FROM system_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN system_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN system_menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName} AND u.status = 1 AND r.status = 1 AND (m.status = 1 OR m.status IS NULL)
